titles.title: A bill to amend the Airport and Airway Safety, Capacity, Noise Improvement, and Intermodal Transportation Act of 1992 with respect to the establishment of the National Commission to Ensure a Strong Competitive Airline Industry.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1602-1603)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.
Senate Committee on Commerce discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.
Senate incorporated this measure in H.R. 904 as an amendment.
Senate passed companion measure H.R. 904 in lieu of this measure by Voice Vote.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Voice Vote.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5015-5019)

bill.summary: 3/17/1993--Indefinitely postponed in Senate. Amends the Airport and Airway Safety, Capacity, Noise Improvement, and Intermodal Transportation Act of 1992 with respect to the establishment of the National Commission to Ensure a Strong Competitive Airline Industry.
